alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones; Nolan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jones, northeastern Nolan, northern Taylor and southern Fisher Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 946 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Longworth, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Roscoe, Nolan, Merkel, Tye, Buffalo Gap, Trent, Sylvester, Noodle, View, Coronados Camp, Longworth, Caps, Dyess Afb, Gannon, Lake Sweetwater, Busby, Capitola, Camp Butman and Stith. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 237 and 276. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west central Texas.
